== Main Inclusion Report for libsexy ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libs/libsexy/, builds on all platforms.

2. ''Rationale:'' xchat-gnome currently builds with it and it's a nice enhancement to the standard GTK widgets.

3. ''Security:'' No CVEs or other security issues

4. ''Quality assurance:''  
** No major bugs known,
** No Debian package
** Responsive Upstream.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
** Standard `cdbs` packaging.
** FHS met.
** Debian policy met.

6. ''Dependencies:''
** all in main
